snippet: After two straight losses in the Eastern Conference finals, Miami Coach Erik Spoelstra’s description of injured Chris Bosh as the team’s “most important player” looks a lot more credible.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column asserts that after two straight losses in the NBA Eastern Conference finals, Miami Heat need Chris Bosh to return from injury in order to beat the Boston Celtics.
lead_paragraph: After two straight losses in the Eastern Conference finals, Miami Coach Erik Spoelstra’s description of injured Chris Bosh as the team’s “most important player” looks a lot more credible.
